title: Learning Facilitator Role Training Program for Hospice Palliative Care Team Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and communication skills
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education combining simulation-based assessment and training-trainer programs, focusing on collaboration scenarios with general practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to apply three core techniques that facilitate field learning for GPs (general practitioners) in hospice and palliative care settings.
Learners will be able to analyze conflict situations and execute mediation strategies through simulation-based role-playing.
Learners will be able to write a reflective report (approximately 2,000 characters) applying theoretical learning to real clinical cases.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
